mapper.select:
SELECT LEFT(a.publish_day,4) publishYear , ROUND(IFNULL(a.`total_asset`,0) / 100000000 ,2) totalAsset , ROUND(IFNULL(a.`total_debt`,0) / 100000000 ,2) totalDebt, ROUND((IFNULL(a.`total_asset`,0) - IFNULL(a.`total_debt`,0)) / 100000000 ,2) pureAsset ,
ROUND(IFNULL(a.`total_debt`,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_asset`,0) * 100 ,2) debtAssetRate , ROUND((IFNULL(a.`total_asset`,0) - IFNULL(a.`total_debt`,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_asset`,0) * 100 ,2) pureAssetRate ,
ROUND(IFNULL(a.`total_flow_asset`,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_asset`,0) * 100 ,2) totalFlowAssetRate, ROUND(IFNULL(a.`total_unflow_asset`,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_asset`,0) * 100 ,2) totalUnflowAssetRate,
ROUND((IFNULL(a.`flow_currency_asset`,0) + IFNULL(a.`flow_storage_asset`,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_flow_asset`,0) * 100 ,2) useAssetRate, ROUND((IFNULL(a.`flow_pay_asset`,0) + IFNULL(a.`flow_bill_asset`,0) + IFNULL(a.`flow_other_bill`,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_flow_asset`,0) * 100 ,2) billAssetRate, ROUND(IFNULL(a.`flow_other_asset`,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_flow_asset`,0) * 100 ,2) flowOtherAssetRate,
ROUND((IFNULL(a.`unflow_fixed_asset`,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_build_project`,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_invest_house`,0)) / IFNULL(a.total_unflow_asset,0) * 100 ,2) fixedAssetRate, ROUND((IFNULL(a.`unflow_stock_right`,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_long_bill`,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_sell_finacial`,0)) / IFNULL(a.total_unflow_asset,0) * 100 ,2) investAssetRate, ROUND((IFNULL(a.`unflow_intangible_asset`,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_company_reputation`,0)) / IFNULL(a.total_unflow_asset,0) * 100 ,2) virtualAssetRate, ROUND((IFNULL(a.`unflow_prepaid_expenses`,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_deferred_tax_asset`,0)) / IFNULL(a.total_unflow_asset,0) * 100 ,2) deferredAssetRate, ROUND(IFNULL(a.`unflow_other_asset`,0)/ IFNULL(a.total_unflow_asset,0) * 100 ,2) unflowOtherAssetRate ,
ROUND(IFNULL(a.total_flow_debt,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) flowDebtRate , ROUND(IFNULL(a.total_unflow_debt,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) unflowDebtRate ,
ROUND((IFNULL(a.flow_sort_loan,0) + IFNULL(a.flow_center_bank_loan,0) + IFNULL(a.flow_same_company_loan,0) + IFNULL(a.flow_sort_debt,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_flow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) loanDebtRate , ROUND((IFNULL(a.flow_pay_bill,0) + IFNULL(a.flow_advance_receive,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_flow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) billDebtRate , ROUND((IFNULL(a.flow_pay_salary,0) + IFNULL(a.flow_pay_tax,0) + IFNULL(a.flow_pay_other,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_flow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) payDebtRate , ROUND(IFNULL(a.flow_other,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_flow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) otherDebtRate ,
ROUND((IFNULL(a.`unflow_long_loan` ,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_pay_long` ,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_unflow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) unflowLoanDebtRate , ROUND((IFNULL(a.`unflow_pay_salary` ,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_pay_special` ,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_estimate_loan` ,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_unflow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) unflowPayDebtRate, ROUND((IFNULL(a.`unflow_deferred_profit` ,0) + IFNULL(a.`unflow_deferred_tax_debt` ,0)) / IFNULL(a.`total_unflow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) unflowDeferredDebtRate , ROUND(IFNULL(a.`unflow_other_debt` ,0) / IFNULL(a.`total_unflow_debt`,0) * 100 ,2) unflowOtherDebtRate
FROM stock_company_asset a WHERE a.stock_code = #{stockCode} AND REPLACE(SUBSTR(a.publish_day,6,2),'/','') = 12 GROUP BY LEFT(a.publish_day,4)
